item.title: Adidas introduces the Superstar 80s Pioneers Pack in Singapore
item.description: Source: adidas. Drawing on Superstar 80s by Gonz. Adidas recently released the Superstar 80s Pioneers Pack, a collaboration with skateboarder Mark Gonzales, known as Gonz, and designer NIGO. Gonz, a renowned innovator and rule-breaker, changed skateboarding for a whole generation. His drive to create inspired the Superstar 80s by Gonz. The shoe’s all-white leather upper serves as a blank slate, inviting wearers to personalize their sneakers using the included markers.
